column1: eddie george mc. guire| eddie george mc. guire
column6: he was the son of mary e. hedrick mc. guire and the late george e. mc. guire. he was a 1978 graduate of hauser high school and lamdba chi alpha graduate of ball state university. he married leslie parker mc. guire september 30
column7: 1995. he was a member of the hartsville masonic lodge. eddie was employed by txcdc as their business developement officer serving the dallas-fort worth area. he enjoyed golf
column10: and spending time with his friends and family. there will be a memorial service saturday
column11: june 27 at 2:00 p. m. at norman funeral home in hope. visitation will be from 11:00 a. m. until service time at the funeral home. burial will be monday june 29 at 1:00 p. m. at garland brook cemetery. in lieu of flowers
column12: the family requests memorial donations be made to the hauser high school athletic department in hope
column13: indiana through norman funeral home. he is survived by his mother
column22: betty stewart and ann hedrick of hartsville
column24: margaret hedrick of hope and dixie hedrick of terre haute; many cousins. he was preceded in death by his father
column27: william and stella smith oliver; eight uncles
